subject: Murders and Attempted Murders
Hit-and-Run Drivers
Drunken and Reckless Driving
lead_paragraph: A jury in Santa Ana, Calif., convicted a drunken driver of murder in the deaths of the promising Los Angeles Angels pitcher Nick Adenhart and two of his friends.
snippet: A jury in Santa Ana, Calif., convicted a drunken driver of murder in the deaths of the promising Los Angeles Angels pitcher Nick Adenhart and two of his friends.
